channel.title: How much can i sell (normal) mushrooms for?
channel.description:
How much can i sell (normal) mushrooms for?
Lets say I had a 9L bucket full of mushrooms, how much could I sell it for at the local market?

item.title: How much can i sell (normal) mushrooms for?
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Use the mushrooms to make soup… use the soup for energy to play runescape… train accounts… sell for cash. Get some more mushrooms. Repeat.

Read full topic

item.source: How much can i sell (normal) mushrooms for?

item.title: How much can i sell (normal) mushrooms for?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Black Morels up here range from 15-20 dollars a pound, sometimes less sometimes more depending on the demand. I live in northern Michigan where mushrooms only grow around 2 months of the year though. We normally sell them to assorted small restaurants.

Read full topic
item.source: How much can i sell (normal) mushrooms for?

item.title: How much can i sell (normal) mushrooms for?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

They are the edible type aren’t they? Many mushrooms are poisonous, so make sure you aren’t picking them to sell.

item.title: How much can i sell (normal) mushrooms for?
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:6, topic:336844”]I can’t believe someone’s asking a question like this ;D You’re not thinking of stealing these mushrooms you speak of, are you?[/quote]Dude, you as a Fin should know that people (older people :D) do that. Thye go and sell them to the shopkeepers at the local markets.

item.title: How much can i sell (normal) mushrooms for?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Put the bucket up near a country road, but an honesty box or summin. Few of my friends made about £20 from stuff they planted a few months earlier.
